Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO LOCAL GOVERNMENT

Title: Authorizes the Centerport Fire District to file an application for exemption from school taxes and real property taxes
Summary: Authorizes the Centerport Fire District to file an application for exemption from school taxes and real property taxes.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to authorizing the Centerport Fire District to file an application for exemption from school taxes and real property taxes
